title: 拜登祝贺蔡英文连任
contents:
难道是十五亿的支票跳票了？

https://twitter.com/JoeBiden/status/1262932298082799624?s=09

Congratulations to Dr. @iingwen on the start of her second term. Taiwan’s thriving democracy and response to COVID-19 are an example to the world. America’s support for Taiwan must remain strong, principled, and bipartisan.

原帖下五毛已经翻车，这时候要不要去拉一波粉红出征呢
